name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Overpowering_Presence_C
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Overpowering Presence C
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Controllers and may be slotted into most control powers and requires the user to be level 50.
power_short_helps: Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
